about_the_game:
A rouge-like, RPG in a dream world. Recruit, train and lead your champions against the treacherous foes awaiting in the Dream Realm

Gameplay

The focus of the game is the turn based action combat. The game uses traditional turn based combat blended with action combat to provide a unique experience. Use each Units unique arsenal of skills, traits, and abilities to gain the advantage in combat.

Roguelike elements - The game will feature roguelike elements where you can acquire new skills and equipment for your team as you travel deeper into the world.

Visuals

The visuals combine the nostalgic style of 90's pixel art with the modern technology to create a hybrid between 2D and 3D games.

Story

The story follows a young man who's family has been cursed by a nightmare. He must venture into the dream realm to rescue his family with the help of his spirit companions.
